uid.description: Unique identifier of the IDP actor mapping (a user in an IDP integrated with SSO to the inTandem authorization bridge)

directory_uid.description: The directory UID this mapping belongs to

idp_user_reference_id.description: External reference ID of the IDP user, used to link the IDP actor to an external system.

actor_type.description: Type of the actor in the inTandem platform. 'staff' refers to a staff member, while 'operator' refers to an operator in the Operators Portal.

actor_uid.description: Unique identifier of the actor in the inTandem platform. This is used to link the IDP actor to a specific staff member or operator.

description: Maps an external IDP user to an inTandem platform actor (staff or operator).
